**Government of Canada's Procurement Information**

### Notice Type

This tender is a competitive Request for Information (RFI) to gather feedback from industry on the Light Tactical Vehicle (LTV) procurement for the Government of Canada, the Department of National Defence, and the Canadian Armed Forces.

### Description

As part of Operation REASSURANCE, Canada will procure Tactical Mobility Platform vehicles to equip a deployed Light Forces Battle Group in Latvia. This accelerated procurement, named Light Tactical Vehicle (LTV), aims to meet the Canadian Armed Forces' need for new light tactical personnel and cargo carrying capabilities.

### Objective

The objectives of this RFI are to assess:

* Whether the delivery time constraints can be met
* Product and performance specifications of available solutions based on time constraints
* A shared understanding with industry about the LTV requirement
* Industry feedback on LTV operational and sustainment requirements, delivery capacity, delivery timelines, and costing

### Communications

All enquiries and communications related to this RFI must be directed exclusively to the Public Services and Procurement Canada Contracting Authority at [SPAC.PAVTL-APLTV.PSPC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:SPAC.PAVTL-APLTV.PSPC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
